mainBoard.name: Warg Rider
mainBoard.originalText:
Menace
Other Orcs and Goblins you control have menace.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, amass Orcs 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)

rulings.text: If you don't control an Army, the Orc Army token you create enters the battlefield as a 0/0 creature before receiving counters. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power enters the battlefield, such as that of Mentor of the Meek, will see the token enter as a 0/0 creature before it gets +1/+1 counters.

In the rare case that you control multiple Army creatures (perhaps because you cast a creature with changeling) while you amass Orcs, you choose which of your Army creatures to put the +1/+1 counters on. If that creature isn't an Orc, it becomes an Orc in addition to its other types.

To amass Orcs N, if you don't control an Army creature, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token. Then you choose an Army creature you control and put N +1/+1 counters on it. If that Army isn't already an Orc, it becomes an Orc in addition to its other types.

mainBoard.text:

At the beginning of combat on your turn, amass Orcs 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)

mainBoard.flavorText: An army of Easterlings charged forth, while from the hills poured Orcs innumerable.

foreignData.name: Avant-garde orientale

foreignData.flavorText: Eine Armee der Ostlinge stürmte heran, während sich von den Hügeln ein unendlicher Strom an Orks ergoss.
foreignData.name: Vorhut der Ostlinge
foreignData.text: Wenn die Vorhut der Ostlinge stirbt, wende Ork-Aufmarsch 1 an. (Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Armee, die du kontrollierst. Sie ist auch ein Ork. Falls du keine Armee kontrollierst, erzeuge zuerst einen 0/0 schwarzen Ork-Armee-Kreaturenspielstein.)

foreignData.flavorText: Un esercito di Esterling partiva alla carica, mentre dalle colline si riversavano Orchi a non finire.
foreignData.name: Avanguardia Esterling
foreignData.text: Quando l'Avanguardia Esterling muore, recluta Orchi 1. (Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su un Esercito che controlli. È anche un Orco. Se non controlli un Esercito, crea prima una pedina creatura Esercito Orco 0/0 nera.)

foreignData.flavorText: 東方人の兵は真っ向より突き進み、丘の上からは数え切れぬほどのオークが押し寄せた。
foreignData.name: 東方人の先陣
foreignData.text: 東方人の先陣が死亡したとき、オーク動員１を行う。（あなたがコントロールしている軍団１体の上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。それはオークでもある。あなたが軍団をコントロールしていないなら、その前に、黒の０/０のオーク・軍団・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: Um exército de Lestenses avançou, enquanto das colinas saíram inumeráveis Orcs.
foreignData.name: Vanguarda dos Lestenses
foreignData.text: Quando Vanguarda dos Lestenses morrer, arregimente Orcs 1. (Coloque um marcador +1/+1 em um Exército que você controla. Ele também é um Orc. Se você não controlar um Exército, crie antes uma ficha de criatura Orc Exército preta 0/0.)

foreignData.flavorText: Un ejército de hombres del este cargó mientras un torrente de orcos se precipitaba desde las colinas.
foreignData.name: Vanguardia de los hombres del este
foreignData.text: Cuando la Vanguardia de los hombres del este muera, enrola 1 Orco. (Pon un contador +1/+1 sobre un Ejército que controlas. También es un Orco. Si no controlas un Ejército, crea primero una ficha de criatura Ejército Orco negra 0/0.)

mainBoard.name: Easterling Vanguard
mainBoard.originalText: When Easterling Vanguard dies, amass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)

rulings.text: Amass Zombies works the same way, except you create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token if you don't control an Army. If the Army creature you chose isn't already a Zombie, it becomes a Zombie in addition to its other types. By combining cards with amass Orcs and amass Zombies, you can end up with an Orc Zombie Army.
Amass abilities are now written as "amass [subtype] N." Previous cards with amass have received errata to say "amass Zombies N."

If you don't control an Army, the Orc Army token you create enters the battlefield as a 0/0 creature before receiving counters. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power enters the battlefield, such as that of Mentor of the Meek, will see the token enter as a 0/0 creature before it gets +1/+1 counters.

In the rare case that you control multiple Army creatures (perhaps because you played a creature with changeling) while you amass Orcs, you choose which of your Army creatures to put the +1/+1 counters on. If that creature isn't an Orc, it becomes an Orc in addition to its other types.
Some cards refer to the "amassed Army." That means the Army creature you chose to receive counters, even if no counters were placed on it for some reason.
Some spells and abilities that amass Orcs may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. You won't amass Orcs.

To amass Orcs N, if you don't control an Army creature, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token. Then you choose an Army creature you control and put N +1/+1 counters on it. If that Army isn't already an Orc, it becomes an Orc in addition to its other types.

mainBoard.text: When this creature dies, amass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)

foreignData.name: 魔多抛石机
foreignData.text:
守军
每当你以一个或数个鬼怪和／或半兽人攻击时，派出一个2/1无色，名称为抛石弹，具飞行异能的组构体衍生神器生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。在战斗结束时牺牲该衍生物。

foreignData.name: Trébuchet du Mordor
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
À chaque fois que vous attaquez avec au moins un gobelin et/ou un orque, créez un jeton de créature-artefact 2/1 incolore Construction avec le vol appelé Rocher balistique, engagé et attaquant. Sacrifiez ce jeton à la fin du combat.

foreignData.name: Wurfmaschine aus Mordor
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
Immer wenn du mit einem oder mehreren Goblins und/oder Orks angreifst, erzeuge einen getappten und angreifenden 2/1 farblosen Konstrukt-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit namens Wurfgeschoss. Opfere den Spielstein am Ende des Kampfes.

foreignData.name: Trabucco di Mordor
foreignData.text:
Difensore
Ogniqualvolta attacchi con uno o più Goblin e/o Orchi, crea una pedina creatura artefatto Costrutto 2/1 incolore con volare chiamata Masso Balistico TAPpata e attaccante. Sacrifica quella pedina alla fine del combattimento.

foreignData.name: モルドールの投石機
foreignData.text:
防衛
あなたがゴブリンやオークのうち１体以上で攻撃するたび、「バリスタの石弾」という名前で飛行を持つ無色の２/１の構築物・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体をタップ状態かつ攻撃している状態で生成する。戦闘終了時に、そのトークンを生け贄に捧げる。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 壁

foreignData.name: Trabuco de Mordor
foreignData.text:
Defensor
Toda vez que você atacar com um ou mais Goblins e/ou Orcs, crie uma ficha de criatura artefato Constructo incolor 2/1 com voar virada e atacando com o nome Rocha Balística. Sacrifique aquela ficha no final do combate.

foreignData.name: Catapulta de Mordor
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
Siempre que ataques con uno o más Trasgos y/u Orcos, crea una ficha de criatura artefacto Constructo incolora 2/1 con la habilidad de volar llamada Roca balística que está girada y atacando. Sacrifica esa ficha al final del combate.

mainBoard.name: Mordor Trebuchet
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender
Whenever you attack with one or more Goblins and/or Orcs, create a 2/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with flying named Ballistic Boulder that's tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that token at end of combat.

rulings.text: Mordor Trebuchet's controller chooses which player, planeswalker, or battle the token is attacking. It doesn't need to be the same player, planeswalker, or battle that any of the Goblins and/or Orcs are attacking.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.flavorText: Even as the Balrog fell, it swung its whip, and the thongs lashed and curled about Gandalf's knees, dragging him to the brink of the abyss. "Fly, you fools!" he cried, and was gone.

foreignData.flavorText: 就当炎魔跌落时，它甩出鞭子，鞭梢直扑甘道夫而来，弯卷缠住了他的双膝，将他拉扯到深渊边缘。「快跑啊，你们这些傻瓜！」一声大喊过后，他随即消失不见。
foreignData.name: 炎魔鞭击
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个生物或支付{4}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
消灭目标生物。

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que le Balrog tombait, il fit tournoyer son fouet et les lanières claquèrent et s'enroulèrent autour des genoux de Gandalf, l'entraînant avec lui au bord de l'abysse. « Fuyez, pauvres fous ! » cria-t-il, avant de disparaître.
foreignData.name: Fouet du Balrog
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez une créature ou payez {4}.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Fallen schwang der Balrog seine Peitsche. Der Schlag schnellte hoch, erfasste Gandalfs Beine und zog ihn an den Rand des Abgrunds. „Flieht, ihr Narren!", rief er und war fort.
foreignData.name: Peitsche des Balrogs
foreignData.text:
Opfere eine Kreatur oder bezahle {4} als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Mentre il Balrog cadeva, sferzò la sua frusta, i cui cordoni si avvinghiarono alle gambe di Gandalf, trascinandolo sull'orlo del baratro. "Fuggite, sciocchi!" gridò, prima di scomparire.
foreignData.name: Sferzata del Balrog
foreignData.text:

Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 落ちながらもバルログはその鞭を振るい、ガンダルフの膝を巻き取り、奈落の縁まで引きずり下ろした。「行け、馬鹿者！」そう叫ぶと、彼は消えていった。
foreignData.name: バルログの鞭打ち
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるか{4}を支払う。
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Enquanto o Balrog caía, ele estralou o chicote, e as tiras açoitaram e envolveram os joelhos de Gandalf, arrastando-o para a beira do abismo. "Fujam, seus tolos!", ele gritou, e se foi.
foreignData.name: Açoite do Balrog
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique uma criatura ou pague {4}.
Destrua a criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Aun mientras caía, el balrog agitó el látigo. Las colas azotaron y rodearon las rodillas de Gandalf, y lo arrastraron al borde del precipicio. —¡Huyan, insensatos! —gritó, y desapareció.
foreignData.name: Latigazo del balrog
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica una criatura o paga {4}.
Destruye la criatura objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Lash of the Balrog
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {4}.
Destroy target creature.

rulings.text: Players can respond to Lash of the Balrog only after it's been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to stop you from casting this spell or to make it cost more mana.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature or pay an extra {4} to cast this spell; you can't cast it without paying one of those costs, and you can't pay either multiple times.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {4}.
Destroy target creature.

mainBoard.name: Gorbag of Minas Morgul
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever a Goblin or Orc you control deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, choose one —
• Draw a card.
• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

rulings.text: You don't choose a mode for Gorbag of Minas Morgul's ability at the time it triggers. Rather, a second "reflexive" ability triggers when you sacrifice a Goblin or Orc this way. You choose a mode for that ability as it goes on the stack. Each player may respond to this triggered ability as normal.

mainBoard.text:

foreignData.name: Gothmog, lugarteniente de Morgul
foreignData.text:

Las fichas de criatura que controlas tienen la habilidad de toque mortal.

mainBoard.name: Gothmog, Morgul Lieutenant
mainBoard.originalText:
When Gothmog, Morgul Lieutenant enters the battlefield, amass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
Creature tokens you control have deathtouch.

rulings.text: Amass Zombies works the same way, except you create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token if you don't control an Army. If the Army creature you chose isn't already a Zombie, it becomes a Zombie in addition to its other types. By combining cards with amass Orcs and amass Zombies, you can end up with an Orc Zombie Army.
Amass abilities are now written as "amass [subtype] N." Previous cards with amass have received errata to say "amass Zombies N."

If you don't control an Army, the Orc Army token you create enters the battlefield as a 0/0 creature before receiving counters. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power enters the battlefield, such as that of Mentor of the Meek, will see the token enter as a 0/0 creature before it gets +1/+1 counters.

In the rare case that you control multiple Army creatures (perhaps because you played a creature with changeling) while you amass Orcs, you choose which of your Army creatures to put the +1/+1 counters on. If that creature isn't an Orc, it becomes an Orc in addition to its other types.
Some cards refer to the "amassed Army." That means the Army creature you chose to receive counters, even if no counters were placed on it for some reason.
Some spells and abilities that amass Orcs may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. You won't amass Orcs.

To amass Orcs N, if you don't control an Army creature, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token. Then you choose an Army creature you control and put N +1/+1 counters on it. If that Army isn't already an Orc, it becomes an Orc in addition to its other types.

mainBoard.text:
When Gothmog enters, amass Orcs 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
Creature tokens you control have deathtouch.

mainBoard.name: Voracious Fell Beast
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Voracious Fell Beast enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a Food token for each creature sacrificed this way. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures, it's never a creature type.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
You can't sacrifice a Food to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate Maraleaf Rider's ability.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When this creature enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. Create a Food token for each creature sacrificed this way. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
